name: faraday
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used for describing containers or screens that stop any electronic signals from getting through: Faraday pouches are designed to prevent keyless car thefts in which thieves pick up the signal from your keyless fob and use it to gain access. A Faraday shield can be formed by a coating of a conductive material. See also
Faraday cage
More examplesFewer examplesFaraday bags, also known as signal blocking pouches, are lined with layers of metallic material that block signals from getting through.Get an inexpensive Faraday key pouch to protect your car.Faraday isolation bags are used to prevent mobile phones and devices from connecting to communication signals.They sell a large Faraday box for keeping up to 10 car keys safe.
